pkg.name: details
pkg.title: Details
pkg.description: The Details component is used to provide users information and links that are helpful but not essential for all users to see.

scope.title: Details
scope.description: The Details component is used to provide users information and links that are helpful but not essential for all users to see.

relatedComponents.name: accordion
relatedComponents.title: Accordion
relatedComponents.description: An accordion hides sections of content users can choose to see if it is relevant to them.

relatedComponents.name: tabs
relatedComponents.title: Tabs
relatedComponents.description: Tabs are used to categorise content into seperate views. A user can navigate between each section of content, displaying one section at a time.
